recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.author: Chef María López
recipe: Cook the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
In a bowl, beat eggs and add grated Parmesan cheese.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Mix the spaghetti with the pancetta and the egg and cheese mixture.
Serve with more cheese and black pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.author: Chef Juan Martínez
recipe: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce.
Add croutons and grated Parmesan cheese.
Prepare the dressing with mayonnaise, garlic, lemon, anchovies, and Parmesan cheese.
Pour the dressing over the lettuce and toss well.
Add more Parmesan to taste before serving.

recipes.name: Valencian Paella
recipes.author: Chef Ana González
recipe: Sauté chicken and rabbit in a paella pan until browned.
Add green beans, garrofón, and crushed tomato.
Add rice and chicken broth.
Incorporate saffron, salt, and paprika.
Cook over low heat until the rice is done.

recipes.name: Al Pastor Tacos
recipes.author: Chef Luis Ramírez
recipe: Marinate the pork in a mixture of achiote, pineapple, and spices.
Cook the meat on a grill or skillet until browned.
Cut the meat into small pieces.
Serve the meat on corn tortillas with pineapple, onion, and cilantro.
Accompany with green salsa and lime.

recipes.name: Salmon Sushi
recipes.author: Chef Kazuo Tanaka
recipe: Wash and cook the sushi rice.
Mix the cooked rice with rice vinegar, sugar, and salt.
Cut the salmon into thin strips.
Form small rice balls and place a strip of salmon on top.
Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.author: Chef Priya Sharma
recipe: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in a pan.
Add the spices: turmeric, cumin, and garam masala.
Add the chicken and cook until browned.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer until the chicken is tender.
Serve with basmati rice and fresh cilantro.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.author: Chef Marco Rossi
recipe: Prepare a pizza base with flour, water, and yeast.
Roll out the dough and cover with tomato sauce.
Add mozzarella cheese and fresh basil.
Bake at 220°C until the cheese is melted and the crust is crispy.
Serve hot and enjoy.

recipes.name: Japanese Ramen
recipes.author: Chef Haruto Sato
recipe: Cook the broth with pork bones, ginger, and garlic for several hours.
Cook the ramen noodles in boiling water.
Serve the noodles in the hot broth.
Add toppings such as a boiled egg, scallions, and pork.
Accompany with soy sauce and sesame oil.

recipes.name: Classic Burger
recipes.author: Chef Tomás Pérez
recipe: Form the ground beef into patties and season with salt and pepper.
Cook the burgers on a grill or skillet.
Toast the burger buns.
Place the meat in the bun with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion.
Serve with fries and condiments to taste.

recipes.name: Chocolate Brownies
recipes.author: Chef Sofía Durán
recipe: Melt chocolate and butter together.
Beat the eggs with sugar and mix with the melted chocolate.
Add flour and chopped nuts.
Pour the batter into a pan and bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.
Cut into squares and serve.
